components.name: IssueAssigneesSelectComponent
components.templateData:
<nz-select class="w-full"
           [formControl]="control"
           nzMode="multiple"
           [nzCustomTemplate]="assigneesSelectedTmpl"
           [nzNotFoundContent]="noUserFoundTmpl"
           nzNoAnimation>
    <nz-option nzCustomContent
               *ngFor="let user of users"
               [nzValue]="user.id"
               [nzLabel]="user.name">
        <j-user [user]="user"></j-user>
    </nz-option>
</nz-select>
<ng-template #assigneesSelectedTmpl
             let-selected>
    <j-user [user]="getUser(selected.nzValue)"></j-user>
</ng-template>
<ng-template #noUserFoundTmpl>
    No user found.
</ng-template>

components.name: IssueCardComponent
components.templateData:
{{ issue.title }}

{{issue.type}}-{{issue.id}}

components.name: IssueCommentComponent
components.templateData:
{{ comment.user.name}}
{{ comment.updatedAt | date:"medium" }}
Pro tip: press M to comment
Save Cancel

components.name: IssueCommentsComponent
components.templateData:
<issue-comment [createMode]="true"
               [issueId]="issue?.id">

</issue-comment>
<issue-comment *ngFor="let comment of issue?.comments"
               [comment]="comment">
</issue-comment>

components.templateData:

           [formControl]="control"

               *ngFor="let user of users"

</nz-select>

</ng-template>

components.name: SvgDefinitionsComponent
SvgIconComponent
components.templateData:
<svg version="1.1"
     [style.width.px]="size"
     [style.height.px]="size"
     [style.fill]="fill"
     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
     xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
    <use [attr.xlink:href]="iconUrl"></use>
</svg>

components.name: UserComponent

components.name: WorkInProgressComponent
components.templateData:
A simplified Jira clone built with Angular and Akita

Visit the work in progress app | View front-end code

Work in progress!

It is still under development.

I am planning to finish coding in about two weeks (13 - 27 Jun 2020) in my spare time.

In the meantime, I am gradually writing a series about how I built it step by step in my blog. Please visit trungk18.com

Made with ♥ in Singapore

© 2020 Trung Vo

  ]
}
